original_text: Later, Zacchaeus stood up in front of everyone. He said to the Lord Jesus, ‘Listen, Master! I will give half of all the things that I have to poor people. I may have taken too much money from some people. I will give back to them four times as much as I took from them wrongly.’
korean_text: 삭개오가 서서 주께 여짜오되 주여 보시옵소서 내 소유의 절반을 가난한 자들에게 주겠사오며 만일 누구의 것을 속여 빼앗은 일이 있으면 네 갑절이나 갚겠나이다

sentences.original_text: He said to the Lord Jesus
I will give half of all the things that I have
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 가진 모든 것의 절반을 주겠습니다

sentences.original_text: I may have taken too much money
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너무 많은 돈을 받았을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: I will give back to them
four times as much as I took from them wrongly
